oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Could this be you? Don't travel unless your trip helps win the war
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This World War II era poster is aimed at convincing Americans to reduce their travel during the war effort. On a blue background, the poster features four illustrations of reasons why Americans may choose to travel, but the implication is that those trips aren't necessary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Posters
